name: Hungry Hippo Boggle
description:
I don't even know what I have created. It's an abomination!

Eat the letters! When the game ends your score is the largest possible word that you can make using those letters eaten.

Controls

WASD to move board

Left click to eat those pesky letters

The game will lag when searching for anagrams (especially in WebGL), so just give it some time!

Please give some feedback using the form below!

https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLScJtNjhMO1iIfRGfI8c2EYBxmYo7MOqY1BLWWFa...
